程序包 org.apache.shardingsphere.transaction.spi

接口 TransactionHook

  • 所有超级接口:
    org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.util.spi.type.typed.TypedSPI
    所有已知实现类:
    TransactionHookAdapter
    public interface TransactionHook
extends org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.util.spi.type.typed.TypedSPI
    ShardingSphere transaction hook.

    • 方法概要

      Process after rolling back the transaction.

      Process before opening the transaction.
